Japanese Movie 2019

4-gatsu no Kimi, Spica (Japanese Drama Review & Summary)

Genre: Romance, Love Triangle, Misunderstanding, Live-Action Manga

Release Date: 2019

Origin: Japan, Adapted from a Manga

Film: 1 hr 39 minutes

Cast

Fukuhara Haruka as Sei Saotome

Sato Taiki as Udagawa Taiyo

Suzuki Jin as Otaka Mizuki

Otani Ryohei as [Kobaiâ€™s uncle]

Ohana Yuno as Tachibana Kaede

This is a very interesting story about a shy girl who transferred to another school.

She felt so embarrassed when she got the lowest score in their math test at 15/100.

While she was looking at her test paper, it got blown away and landed on the feet of Taiyo, who picked it up and laughed at it.

Her schoolmates sniggered that she made the average of the class go down in ranking among other sections of their year.

Taiyo raised his hand and said that he will study for the next exam and their ranking should go up.

She was in the school corridor looking at the sky. She was talking to the white star in the sky, asking it what she should call it.

A boy behind her asked if she was interested in astronomy. Then before she could answer, he was unzipping his telescope (is it me this sounded rather rude? ðŸ™‚ lol) and showing her stars.

He pointed to the star that she was looking at and told her the name of it was Spica. He added that it was the star that he loved the most. This boy was Mizuki, best friend of Taiyo.

At seventeen, Sei fell in love with the gorgeous Mizuki.

Mizuki asked her to join the astronomy club, though there is only other one member which was Taiyo.

By coincidence, their names correspond to heavenly bodies. Mizuki is moon, Taiyo is sun and Sei is star.

Taiyo was very gregarious and made Mizuki their gopher and cleaner to punish her for her impure thoughts about Mizuki.

Sei complained that she does not have impure thoughts but she does like Mizuki.

Mizuki and Taiyo were considered a heavenly pair at school. Sei being with the boys made her the target of jealous girls.

Mizuki and Taiyo, however, protected her.

One day, Sei found Mizuki alone in the school roof. She canâ€™t help herself and confess to him.

Mizuki was surprised and did not know what to say and became rather aloof.

Sei ran off in embarrassment straight to the arms of Taiyo who was so annoyed with Mizuki.

Taiyo had developed feelings for Sei so to comfort her, he kissed her.

Sei was shocked because she had just confessed her feelings to Mizuki.

Anyway, Sei suddenly saw Taiyo in a different light and he really started pursuing her.

He talked about Spica and its darling star the Arcturus. He said that Arcturus and Spica were sky lovers and would meet every 60,000.

Sei asked what if Spica or even Arcturus met someone else before they get to one another.

Taiyo said it can happen but Spica and Arcturus are fated.

They were getting on like a house on fire and started dating when a girl from both Taiyo and Mizukiâ€™s past appeared.

She was Amakawi Saki.

Saki was Taiyoâ€™s girlfriend. He adored her but one day he found her and Mizuki sharing a kiss.

Taiyo was so upset.

Mizuki said that Saki kissed him and not the other way around.

Taiyo canâ€™t forgive Saki for cheating on him and while they were arguing Saki collapsed.

Saki had heart problem.

Now she was back and Taiyo had to be tender with her as she might have another attack.

Sei was now being told by the girls who were initially bullying her to get her man. They said that they might not like Sei but she was more tolerable than the stunning Saki.

Anyway, Mizuki was so annoyed with Taiyo for ignoring Sei. He told Taiyo that he had always wanted Sei, it was just he canâ€™t express his feelings.

Taiyo finally realised that he canâ€™t afford to lose Sei to Mizuki.

So between him and Mizuki, they arranged to have a swimming contest. The one who wins will get Sei.

The boys had their contest. Sei went to the pool to find Sei but it was Mizuki who was there.

Mizuki said that he knew she would come and she would say that it was Sei she wanted. He said he likes her but Taiyo was his best friend so he will support them both. Mizuki told Sei that Taiyo left a message for her to meet him at the observatory.

She ran there as fast as she could.

And then he found her,

They made up and lie there on the ground trying to watch falling meteors.
